resources.string: What Would you Like to do?
Choose Specific Contacts to Migrate to the New Format.\nFor Example, Selected Phone Numbers will be migrated from 01-XXX XXX to 21-XXX XXX.
Migrate All Contacts to the New Format.\nFor Example, All Phone Numbers will be migrated from 01-XXX XXX to 21-XXX XXX.
Choose Specific Contacts to Revert back to the Old Format.\nFor Example, Selected Phone Numbers will be reverted from 21-XXX XXX to 01-XXX XXX.
Revert All Contacts to the Old Format.\nFor Example, All Phone Numbers will be reverted from 21-XXX XXX to 01-XXX XXX.
Move to the Next Step of the Flow
Selected contacts will be migrated to the new format.\nFor Example, 01-XXX XXX will be migrated to 21-XXX XXX.
Selected contacts will be reverted to the old format.\nFor Example, 21-XXX XXX will be reverted to 01-XXX XXX.
